website_summaries.verdict: Sleek, solid, and versatile, this storage bench feels right at home in any room. Earns first place for its appealing design and practical functionality.
pros: Clean lines with stitched detailing works well with almost any look
Solid and sturdy enough to hold considerable weight
This bench stands out for its large storage capacity
Lid features child safety hinges to keep it from snapping shut when open
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Plastic feet are on the short side and we'd prefer it if they were made of wood

website_summaries.verdict: You'll find extra seating and storage in this well-designed ottoman.
pros: Rectangular design offers incredible storage space
Hinges hold the lid open for easy loading
cons: Plastic feet aren't up to the standard of the rest of the ottoman

website_summaries.verdict: A simple bench that provides a little bit of padding for people wanting to use the bench as an ottoman in the living room.
pros: A large variety of colors available to match virtually any interior decor
cons: Some owners complain the hinges weaken over time

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on December 6th and got it on the 8th. I am very happy with it so far. Price was good and delivery was excellent. Merry Christmas to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Baize

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Not as large as you would think though.
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was going to be a bit bigger but other then that this is a great product. Our 2 year old jumps up and down on it, my cat has retracted his claws into it, we have spilled food on it, and all this and it hasn't even been a month of ownership yet. Its still in new condition. No damage, smells new, etc. Definitely worth the money, since its not that expensive to begin with. Shipping was lovely, it came a in a long box ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman/coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the right ottoman---one that I can prop my feet on, not too big, not too high, and that can double as a coffee table. This is perfect! The price on this particular color was reduced so I got a very good buy. The padding makes it very comfortable to prop my feet on, although it does take a while for the dent not to show. It isn't leather and may not hold up well over time, but it could be recovered easily---just staple the new fabric over it. It looks very good and I highly recommend it for those not wanting to spend a lot on a nice, leather look ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: kaycur

customer_reviews.title: I am not at all happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all happy with this purchase. I received my order a week late even though it was coming from about 30 minutes away. Put it in my garage until I was ready to use it, and opened the box to find a gaping hole in the storage bench. I don’t know if the damage was done in transit or at the manufacturer. But by the time I noticed my return date had passed. Now I’m stuck with a bench that is useless unless I pay to have it fixed. I would have given it negeative stars but that’s not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: I positively love this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I positively love this ottoman...I purchased this to store my extra blankets and pillow...it was delivered on time and I only had to screw in the little legs...the top has hinges so it will stay open when getting anything in or out...I have it setting in front of my master bedroom window and I can sit on it to put on my shoes, boots, etc. ..I plan on buying another ottoman for my guest bedroom to store the bedding...this ottoman looks good enough to be in my livingroom...
customer_reviews.author: Twiny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with large interior
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Delivery was fast & the package afforded good protection of its contents. The product is sturdy, well put together and looks beautiful when assembled. I was able to fit a lot of sheets & blankets into the very large interior. The faux leather has fooled more than a few visitors to my home & I have received many compliments on it. It was very straight forward to put together and it didn't even take 30 minutes. All the parts were in great shape & without any damage. I think I am going to buy another in a different color, for another room.
customer_reviews.author: christina newsome

customer_reviews.title: Well made, serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: It looks rich and is an enhancement to our bedroom at the foot of the bed as we needed a little more accessible storage for my husband. He wishes there was a little more clearance room on the lid instead of it fitting flat but he has it stuffed already! We would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated yetanother item that came damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived noticeably warped on 1 corner I did keep it only because this was like my third purchase of larger items from Amazon that came with issues and had to be sent back I was so frustrated and dissapointed that I just kept it and put a throw over it. I wish I would have returned because the damaged corner is getting worse and worse. I am totally addicted to Amazon but I've just been so dissapointed with the larger items that I will not order pieces like this in the future
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and look for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This works great and looks nice. A great place to store linens and an extra blanket at the foot of my bed. The price was about the best I could find and it feels well made. My only little nitpick are, I wish the faux leather was a little better quality. This feels a little thinner and a little more "plasticky" than others I have. The other thing I wish they included were non skid rubber things to put on the feet. Not a biggie; easily fixed by a trip to Ace Hardware.
customer_reviews.author: FactChecker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking/Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have an issue with storage and a little one coming for Christmas, this worked great for both! I was able to put blankets and pillows in it and when my grandson was pulling himself up, I had no worries about him bumping his head on a pointy corner! Not to mention comfy place for your feet or extra seating! Very sturdy and all I had to do is put the feet on and it was done!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy: poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions were solid but build quality is not good. The top of the ottoman is uneven and definitely not as solid as I would like. There is a dip in the center - not sure if it is just plywood or another cheap build material beneath the faux leather exterior. To be fair, the size and storage space is good. But the build quality is so bad that I can’t recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Exactly what we were looking for. True to size and and a rich dark chocolate color. The top opens nicely and closes softly so it's safe for children. It's comfy enough to sit on to put shoes on or something in a short amount of time but probably wouldn't recommend as a staple piece of sitting furniture. Very spacious inside. I can see what the other reviewers meant when they said it had kind of a strong smell. Not bad, just like a new product. It's not a very potent smell until you open the top. But like I said, not bad at all. Extremely happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Super value for a faux leather, but sturdy storage ottoman. Many in this price range (it was a 50% off sale) are cheap press board with a a flimsy cover. This at least looks like leather, and there is some wood in the frame (pine). There's a pretty strong hinge for the top. This is perfect for my needs, which is to tidy up my living room and hide some things.
customer_reviews.author: Bunson Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STORAGE
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage chest. I have it at the foot of my double bed & will be storing blankets and pillows in it. I live in 630 sq ft so I really needed the additional storage. PROS: The Faux Leather is very soft and looks like real leather! The brown is a deep rich color and works well with everything in my bedroom. Love the 48" length. CON: Could be a couple of inches taller but it will work. PEACE
customer_reviews.author: FAIRYmAMA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful benches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two dark brown faux leather benches to place on each side of my fireplace; they look perfect. Plenty of interior space to contain extra blankets and pillows, made sturdy, shipped separately at designated times. I'm pleased with the overall quality. Preferred vertical width measurements higher, but purchased them anyway, and I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality! Looks much more expensive than it is. Easy to open/close and comfortable as heck!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product, and I would buy it again if and when I need to. It is made with great material that feels rich, looks rich and is very durable -can be sat on laid on stood on by a LOT of weight. There is tons of space inside as well. Just buy it, stop looking. I'd take a picture of it, but I'm too busy relaxing on it lol. 10/10 Perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived super fast, is lightweight so easy for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed this in my guest room so that visitors could have a place to sit/put their suitcase down. Arrived super fast, is lightweight so easy for me to move around. I have not decided what to use the inside for yet however, I'm sure I'll think of something. My only wish was that I would have read the description closer - I'd have liked one a wee bit taller. But, it was a great price, it's going to work just fine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shayronna

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fits great in my space.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Got rid of my coffee table for this ottoman. Nice space on the inside (storing all of my photo albums). Comfortable place to rest my feet from my couch or my rocking chair. Should be able to use it as extra seating during parties and get togethers without having to find a place to move a coffee table to, to get it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bench to have a place to fold down our comforter and keep it off the floor. Pleather upholstery looks great, lightweight enough to handle easily, narrow enough to get around the end of the bed without stubbing a toe but wide enough to hold an extra blanket/pillow or two, wide enough to not look puny at the foot of a king size bed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: palmettopeach

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Not as durable as we hoped. We’ve had this a year a half, but it started showing signs of wear and tear long before that. The quality of the bonded leather doesn’t hold up and glue started to break down. Our other bonded leather storage ottoman we purchased from Marshals years ago has lasted longer than this one. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Genson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece to unclutter!
customer_reviews.text: Very welcome addition to our house. It’s discreet and very well made. Acts like a nice bed for the dogs who curl up on it daily! Things that would pile up on the old hassock are now neatly folded inside. I’m thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: debraterri

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!  It has given me more seating and storage in my great room!
customer_reviews.text: My 325 lb son, his wife and their 3 children sat on this storage ottoman for Christmas photos. One person can sit on either end and it will not tilt over. It is strong and durable. It is light to pick up but strong and has lots of space for storage. My other family members wanted to know where I purchased it. It was a great price! It arrived earlier than the scheduled date!
customer_reviews.author: walter d.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ottoman for the price
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered a similar looking ottoman and was incredibly disappointed and had to return it. It had bad stitching and I sat on it and the wood cracked/broke . So my review is to compare this one to that one. Amazing! The seat has much more padding . The stitching is wonderful and it's just a lot better made altogether
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This has been in our home for two months now and has withstood the assault of my 2 and 6 year old sons. It's sturdy and easy to clean. I mainly bought this to deal with throw pillows I never know what to do with it, it only holds 4 of the 6; but at least those 4 are out of my way. It serves admirably as extra seating when my son has friends over. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is absolutely beautiful. I didn’t expect it to be such high quality! Love it and it will serve as an ottoman/ table in front of my daybed. Really happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caruch

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, but very underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Looks very similar to another ottoman we have, but made of inferior products. It weights much less than you would expect - and that's because there isn't much to it. Material is very thin and I'm surprised it hasn't torn yet. For the price, I expected a little more. We paid about 30% more for our other bench / ottoman, but I would says it's going to last years longer than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Techguy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! I wanted something to "hide" all my ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I wanted something to "hide" all my grand-daughter's toys in, when she's not visiting, and this was perfect. It looks great in my living room and she loves that she can open it up and just stare at all her toys piled up inside! I also have it under a set of windows, so she can get up on it and look outside to see when "Mama" is coming. Very sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage solution.
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is perfect for our family needs. I wanted to replace our coffee table with storage and extra seating for the kids when they play video games. It is ideal for both. It can hold multiple blankets, which are hidden away. Makes for easy clean up if company is coming. Bonus the cat has another place to lounge.
customer_reviews.author: Erynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: We use this bench in a commercial setting, which means that we're opening and closing it literally dozens of times each day. Six-plus months in, it's holding up nicely. Pictures and dimensions were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Overall, nice product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this pretty nice. The color is pretty close to the picture and is a fairly dark brown. I am little concerned about the leg supports with regard to long term durability. There are only the four legs on the outside corners. Because this is a bench I sit on everyday for changing, there needs to be a leg support in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to protect my baby from the fireplace hearth and they work great! They also store some toys so that's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Love this, perfect for what I wanted to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this, perfect for what I wanted to use it for! Put it at the end of my bed with all my spare blankets and pillows in it! Now i can sit and put shoes on or lay my clothes out on it for the morning! Great purchase! Once my spare room is in order, I’ll be buying another one! Came fast, super easy to put the legs on and in perfect shape! Job well done!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Well built and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I use this piece for storage and extra seating. It looks great, is very sturdy and seals up well.. I am away from home for large portions of the year, so I don't have to worry about any bugs or mice ever getting into it (as you might with a linen closet). I tend to use it to keep heirlooms and keepsakes inside.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality considering it’s only 100 bucks. The material seems durable, the stitching and construction is quality. The alignment of the lid and box are square, no problems. The top stays up when lifted which makes for a nice toy box the kids can access contents easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I must say I'm very pleased with the item at the moment cause I just got . Its seems sturdy & easy to assemble. I liked the washer that came with the leg cause of the grip when assembling the legs. So yeah for the price is right. The hinges or what ever it's called to hold lid open seems sturdy when holding it open. So yeah I rate it a 5⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged - had to return
customer_reviews.text: Item was good size, but cheaper quality than expected. Not packaged great, so one corner was damaged upon delivery, so we decided to just return for refund and not replace.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard50

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is perfect. All you have to do is throw washers ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellently built product that is heavy duty. Stitching is perfect. All you have to do is throw washers on the four legs and screw them in. GREAT place for storing bed linens and throw pillows. Excellent product. Excellent shipping. Excellent seller. Five Stars! Item came on time and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cy Martin II

customer_reviews.title: Large storage space chest
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Fits just about the length of my queen bed at its foot. More storage than I expected esp compared to other chests
customer_reviews.author: James Strouse

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece but arrived damaged...
customer_reviews.text: Was very nice piece except for that in came in damaged and had to be returned. We did not want to take a chance on another. If you saw the condition of the box when it arrived you would understand. But it was well made, nice size, good storage area. So if you're feeling lucky, give it a try... nice piece and a normal brown color (not too light, not too dark).
customer_reviews.author: LFPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised...and then some!
customer_reviews.text: It's always great when a product not only meets the expectations set by the product images and description, but exceeds them. This is how I feel about this ottoman. I had spent the last three months looking for the ottoman that was the perfect size, color and quality for my living room. This one delivered. It's perfect for storing my kids' backpacks and my work bag and when we have guests over, the kids can sit on the ottoman without me having to worry about it getting any damage. I highly recommend this ottoman for anyone looking for the right combination of quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: I. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived damaged and when I contacted Amazon it was replaced within 3 days. I like the ottoman very much for the Grands toys and after the Grands outgrow their toys I will have a nice ottoman to put blankets etc in at the foot of my bed.
customer_reviews.author: cchunterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. No defects or none seen at this point in time. Could be a little taller for my purposes. I have all leather furniture and would rather faux to put my feet on. Perfect for me. Will be putting it on casters for easier cleaning under it and a little more height.
customer_reviews.author: Gen 💖

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, very solid
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, very solid. I knew the measurements going in but was somehow surprised by how low it is. It does not have a lot of storage due to this but I cannot knock it as the dimensions are clearly listed.
customer_reviews.author: CAZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Ottoman, especially for the price. It came fully assembled with the exception of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: This bench looks perfect at the end of our bed and allows us ...
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks perfect at the end of our bed and allows us to store things since we do not have under-the-bed storage. It has a ton of room and also acts as a padded climbing step for our toddler to climb onto the bed itself (without the legs, of course). If you're looking for additional storage in a great-looking bench, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, and handles a decent sitting load
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks great, considering the price, and has plenty of storage space. It was pretty easy to screw in the legs, though one of the holes wasn't aligned properly. Just used a little elbow grease and it worked out fine. So far it's handled about 300 lbs sitting on it without a complaint. It has a slight odor when first opened, but it was pretty much gone after 30 minutes of leaving the lid open.
customer_reviews.author: NomanPrinoman

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! We are using it as a coffee table and it fits perfectly in my living room, which is on the small side. I store pillows and blankets in it for visitors, or when all the kids come home. I couldn't have asked for more, considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice stool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stool as a foot stool in front of the couch. It is very nice and deep to store throws in.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench is beautiful, one of my best amazon purchase. This piece is sturdy holds a lot, beautiful leather/or other. It was easy to put the legs in, they just screwed in. I highly recommend this storage bench.
customer_reviews.author: Renee geneva illinois

customer_reviews.title: The benches are great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to go with a dining table, although I changed out the legs so that they sit tall enough. The benches are great, comfortable, and sturdy with LOTS of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect. The size is great. I needed something to allow my little terrier dog to jump on my extra tall bed, but wanted smething besides stairs, something useful for more. So I looked online and in stores. This was a great deal and exceeded my expectations. The inside was much roomer than expected. Its made well, with good matetials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks sturdy and well made but it came with a scratch
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it 5 starts and not 5 it's because it came with a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Anniel Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good seat and storage unit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy seat and storage at the end of the bed. Love having this to sit on while getting dressed. Store the extra blankets and pillows inside so they are stuffed up in the closet or laying around. Like the leatherish feel and good safety hinge. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Riley

customer_reviews.title: Looks solid and aesthetically attractive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother, it matches everything and fits a good amount of whatever she needs to stuff inside. Feels sturdy and should outlast most things in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice and is durable.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. It is not sturdy enough to sit on but it works great to store all my son's game accessories and has held up for over a year, with no visible signs of wear and it is used in the living room with people putting their feet on it everyday, multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: It will be perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a coffee table storage bench; it's a little low for that purpose but I plan to move it to a bedroom to sit at the foot of a bed. It will be perfect for that. It was very easy to assemble. Just had to put on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with this storage bench
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this storage bench. Just screw the legs on and done! It looks very high quality and it is worth every penny. They could charge more and it would still be a bargain. I don't have a lot of cash to toss about to furnish my tiny house so I look for bargains on amazon that do double duty. This is a gem. A good amount of storage space and comfy seating all in one. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: T.Ann

customer_reviews.title: Product was very nice for price
customer_reviews.text: Product was very nice for price. Came in perfect condition and was even delivered to my door which was great since it was large and I live in apartment. I,be had it for several months now and I am very pleased with quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: beautiful storage bench....nice quality.....hinges that don't allow the top to slam shut.....plenty of storage room....looks very nice in the living room in place of a cocktail table and is functional in that the top is smooth so you can place your cup of coffee on it.
customer_reviews.author: Verogram

customer_reviews.title: Not great. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not great. You get what you pay for. Out of the box there was a milky filmy finish on the lower part of the box - the top was shiny brown like you expect leather to look. I cleaned it with leather cleaner which works for awhile and then the milky look comes back slowly. And I "clean" it again. There is also a dent the goes across the top of right side width. It wasn't worth trying to send it back. If I ever buy another one I'll get it from Costco or somewhere I can do a return easily if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: very nice ottoman
customer_reviews.text: love this ottoman. I'm happy with my decision. almost went with the square style but was also higher. I like the storage for pillows or blankets and also provides plenty of room. and the lid stays were you put it "open" won't slam on unsuspecting fingers 😎
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good size, perfect condition, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for the end of our king-Sized bed for all the dog’s toys. Not super deep but holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: This Faux Leather storage unit is perfect for our loft. We were able to hold a lot of my 2 year olds toys plus extra blankets for when we have guests. The top is soft so that my 2 year old does't hurt himself when climbing on it. Also, sturdy enough to hold cups or plates if you're using it as a coffee table. It's the perfect color of brown and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but I wish it were a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it looks great, holds up to me sitting on it well, and the hinges hold in place so they don't slam shut (good for little kids). However, it is a little bit smaller than I though!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing
customer_reviews.text: The size is wrong had to to returned it Though I love the color
customer_reviews.author: cdm

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My experience of buying through Amazon so far has been great. The product comes usually BEFORE the due date. Free shipping and handling you can't beat that and the product is well worth the money. It feels and looks like real leather. It's comfortable to sit on and spacious in side. Made well, and the only assembly is screwing on the 4 little wooden feet. I would definitely recommend this product and I am thinking about purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN MARCH

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is very durable as a seat all kinds of back sides have sat on it and as stood the test of time , I purchased them for my sister and she absolutely loves them, they did not disappoint and the price was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: margo johnson

customer_reviews.title: No more clutter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and very functional. Immediately this ate up alot of living room clutter from the kids. I give it 4 stars based on the hinges from other reviews as mine are fine on day one but do see them as a problem point in the future and hoping I can fix them and make it work long term. Love not having the toys everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: NH Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: ... a coffee table made of what at least looked like leather for my family room
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a coffee table made of what at least looked like leather for my family room. Wanted something kid-friendly and perhaps you could even sit on it. This fit the bill. My daughter calls it a "treasure chest" because it's a great place for me to keep a lot of her toys for easy access since her playroom is in the basement. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent additional to our home
customer_reviews.text: Excellent additional to our home! The quality is great and it has ample storage. We ordered to place in our entry hallway for additional seating and storage. We have ordered tapered legs 7" to add height for comfortable seating. We would definitely order this item again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but had damage
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this ottoman. I had to return it because when it arrived it had a significant defect on front of lid. It looks like a puncture damage. Otherwise, it is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: wanda potter

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled ;just added feet. Easy to remove from box. Put this in front of my sofa. Perfect foot rest, holding laptop & snacks, and excellent storage. I’m using heavy coasters to place drinks on top due to the cushion top. Does NOT look “cheap”. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a month now and it is perfect. I use it to hold all of our blankets. My toddler loves to lay in it and he has no complaints either.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quill

customer_reviews.title: A perfect piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an ottoman to provide extra storage for office supplies in my office. This IS PERFECT. The color is a dark dark brown, probably considered an espresso color. It matched my office furniture perfectly. The ottoman is light so easy enough for me to move around and well made. It provided the much needed storage for paper, ink, pens and stuff I needed in my office. The hinges are strong and holds the lid up while you get things in and out. The cushion top is soft and springs back into shape immediately after sitting on it. The price was also good as the few I found in the local stores were double the price.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months and send to be holding up fine. Seems like a good product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: we bought this along with the Prepac 60" Hanging Entryway ...
customer_reviews.text: we bought this along with the Prepac 60" Hanging Entryway Shelf, Espresso to create our own area for the kids to put their stuff rather than having something built out. the combo has worked really well for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.author: wtpa

customer_reviews.title: I like that is has ample storage
customer_reviews.text: It matched the faux leather portion of my current sofa perfectly. I like that is has ample storage, comfortable as an ottoman and I use a tray so that I can set a glass on it as a table top.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ottoman.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a really expensive dog step. It was worth every single penny just for that, bonus that the faux leather does in fact look real and it is a wonderful piece to our room. Double bonus the storage can hold a large blanket, or clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - easy to assemble (just put feet on) - very spacious interior and a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice size!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend; great for foot of king size bed for linen storage.
customer_reviews.author: pharmamama

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This piece is exactly as described. It looks great in our family room. It was super easy to assemble. It was well packaged and arrived on schedule without defect.
customer_reviews.author: Efly9

customer_reviews.title: 😁😔
customer_reviews.text: OK I’m already assembled which is great very sturdy nice color lots of storage room my only complaint is that it had two small holes In the fabric on the top
customer_reviews.author: xoDeviousox

customer_reviews.title: Great attractive storage piece for all of my indoor orchid supplies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece. I have stored all of my orchid potting media, pots, and other orchid care products in it and there is still,some extra room. The fabric, if not leather, appears and feels like genuine leather. My husband is delighted to gave a pretty new seating piece in our dinning room and that my orchid supplies are hidden away. Wish Imhad room for another one, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: B.B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: This provides a great footstool and so much storage! I use it for my grandson's toys, so the are not scatted all over my living room. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Linda Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: We bought this just for storage, and it has more than we expected
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ann Groce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for babies/kids toys in the living room. Have had it for almost a year and the fake leather hasn’t torn or scuffed at all and I have a house full of kids that sit/stand on it, open and close it, they’ve used it as a hiding place during hide and seek. It’s awesome! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, has a lot of room in it and it's sturdy. Can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: crow1214

customer_reviews.title: It fits nicely under a window and looks great with my brown ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my family room for storage and extra seating. It fits nicely under a window and looks great with my brown leather furniture. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it smells like factory glues or something. I've been airing it out for a few days an it's getting better every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Volby

customer_reviews.title: yet it's sturdy enough to hold multiple solid objects plus a 140 ...
customer_reviews.text: Am using this for bedroom storage. It's light enough for me to stand up and put the feet in, then scoot to bedroom. One person job getting it set up, yet it's sturdy enough to hold multiple solid objects plus a 140 pound person. Amazon came through yet again!
customer_reviews.author: Sliding Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Good value piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Matched my couch perfectly and provides a great spot for extra seating, footrest, and a little extra storage. We'll see how it holds up to the abuse of kids all over my furniture over time, but so far happy with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Overton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like it to sit on to put on my shoes and store blankets but it needs to be about 12inches higher
customer_reviews.author: Brad Landvik

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a much pricier piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good size, looks great. I have priced benches in stores that looked worse and cost more. Recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. M.

customer_reviews.title: No more searching!! Everything at her fingertips!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this everyday for storage of bedding and things!!! She loves it, everything is right there!!! No more searching.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Ron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this ottoman. It looks elegant, you can store many cushions, pillows or blankets. It has also helped our kitty climb more easily onto our bed. He has a back problem so it works as a step!
customer_reviews.author: blossom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with size & look!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot longer than I thought & holds so much more than the last one we had. The lid is very secure when it’s propped open & it looks very nice in the space it fills.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K. Usko

customer_reviews.title: Storage & Seating Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is one of three storage ottomans that I purchased when they were all on sale. This one happened to match the design & dark brown color of the trundle bed from Wayfair in my son's room (that was an awesome plus). It's been great to store movies, Xbox games & other things to organize clutter. You could put extra bedding or etc instead, also. It's great acting as storage as well as additional seating in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Darts

customer_reviews.title: Works and appears as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Doing what it's supposed to do... storing bedding at the foot end of our bed. Simple, neat, sturdy design. Hinges hold the lid in the open position nicely. Lined interior. Padded lid. All in all, it's a nice looking piece that does what it's supposed to do. We're happy with it and would recommend it to anyone looking for the same type of item. Once again, Amazon made purchasing the item easy, hassle free and it was delivered on time. Well done Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T. (Ramona, CA)

customer_reviews.title: What a nice storage bench
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived a day earlier. Kudos to Amazon and to the seller! What a nice storage bench. It exceeded my expectation. It arrived packed nicely and without any damaged. Beautiful product! It is so roomy and was able to store the things I wanted to store. Recommended to anybody who needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended 💚
customer_reviews.text: Well made, tight stitch sturdy and lots of space for storage. 💚
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Medina

customer_reviews.title: Slight smaller than it may look, but nice.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the dimensions are correctly listed in the ad, but I was still surprised at how low to the ground this is. Otherwise, it is as advertised and was delivered without any issues. All you need to do is screw on the feet to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: SCar7

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Avalon 48 inch Wide Rectangle Lift Top Storage Ottoman Bench in Upholstered Tanners Brown Faux Leather with Large Storage Space for the Living Room, Entryway, Bedroom, Contemporary
product_meta.description: Color:Tanners BrownClutter and mess everywhere. What you need is a tasteful, well made storage solution. The Avalon Large Rectangular Storage Ottoman Bench is made from durable Tanners Brown Faux Leather and is the answer to all your needs. This attractive ottoman is extra strong and durable and features a beautiful stitched exterior and large storage interior. Whether you use this ottoman in your entryway, living room, family room, basement or bedroom, it will allow you to hide away all that mess. This ottoman is available in Brown, black, cream, Red and blue PU plus Brown and Grey linen look fabrics.; Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography; At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied
feature_bullets: HAND CONSTRUCTED using solid wood, engineered woods and upholstered in a durable Tanners Brown Faux Leather
LARGE INTERIOR STORAGE SPACE with lift top lid
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL ottoman can be used in bedroom, living room, family room, hallway as an entryway bench, foot stool, accent furniture or provide additional sitting
Child safety hinge to prevent lid slamming

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,372 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: We guarantee this product's workmanship and material quality for 6 months from the date of purchase, assuming normal use. Please contact our customer care center for questions regarding product guarantee.
